lead_paragraph: Sprint said the jobs were part of an earlier commitment by the Japanese company, which owns a controlling stake in the wireless carrier.

byline.original: By NELSON D. SCHWARTZ and MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

headline.print_headline: Trump Takes Credit in Plan by Sprint for Jobs in U.S.
headline.main: Trump Takes Credit for Sprint Plan to Add 5,000 Jobs in U.S.

snippet: Sprint said the jobs were part of an earlier commitment by the Japanese company, which owns a controlling stake in the wireless carrier....
